entries.description: Add support for creating/debugging Golang Lambdas (#649)
Fix breaking run configuration gutter icons when the IDE has no languages installed that support Lambda local runtime (#2504)
Fix issue preventing deployment of CloudFormation templates with empty values (#1498)
Fix cloudformation stack events failing to update after reaching a final state (#2519)
Fix the Local Lambda run configuration always reseting the environemnt variables to defaults when using templates (#2509)
Fix being able to interact with objects from deleted buckets (#1601)
Lambda gutter icons no longer take deployed Lambdas into account due to accuracy and performance issues
